attributes.action: take notice of petitions on his website, particularly the large one demanding that he resign. Don't sign this one go to the very large one already on this website..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government, under the Scot Gordon Brown has brought our country to it's knees. We are the laughing stock of Europe and have no power in the rest of the World. He has to go including the rest of the lying, conniving, expenses claiming, Government. He has to go NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
